title: Peter Norvig - Wikipedia
snippet: Peter Norvig (born 14 December 1956) is an American computer scientist and Distinguished Education Fellow at the Stanford Institute for Human-Centered AI. He previously served as a director of research and search quality at Google. Norvig is the co-author with Stuart J.

title: Peter Norvig
snippet: Distinguished Education Fellow at Stanford HAI, Research Director at Google. Co-author of Artificial Intelligence: A Modern Approach, the leading AI textbook used in 1,500+ universities worldwide. peter@norvig.com / resume / github / medium / photo gallery / legacy homepage

title: Peter Norvig
